agent

Class Farm

  • java.lang.Object
    • agent.Farm

  • public class Farm
extends java.lang.Object
    Farm object contains people and parameters associated with each farm, as well as a copy of activity list, preferences and experiences, and network connections
    Author:
    kellerke

      • Farm

        public Farm(java.lang.String name,
            Location location,
            org.jgrapht.Graph<java.lang.String,org.jgrapht.graph.DefaultEdge> socialNetwork,
            java.util.List<java.lang.Double> incomeHistory,
            double personalIncomeAverage,
            FarmProductMatrix farmingExperience,
            FarmProductMatrix preferences,
            java.util.List<Activity> activities,
            double diss_tolerance,
            double income_tolerance,
            java.util.List<Activity> currentActivities,
            Person farmHead,
            Parameters parameters)
        Constructor method for farm object
        Parameters:
        name - of the farm
        location - of the farm
        socialNetwork - social network of the farm
        incomeHistory - history to initialize farm
        personalIncomeAverage - average of income except most recent time period
        farmingExperience - shared experience matrix
        preferences - activity preference
        activities - full activity list
        diss_tolerance - tolerance to dissimilarity
        income_tolerance - tolerance to differences in income
        currentActivities - list of current farm activities during initalization
        farmHead - person object to lead farm
        parameters - simulation parameters

      • updateFarmData

        public void updateFarmData(java.util.List<Farm> allFarms,
                           double income,
                           double probability)
        Update all parameters of the farm data
        Parameters:
        allFarms - list of all the input farms
        income - input value of farm
        probability - of an income occurring in our distribution

      • makeDecision

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> makeDecision(java.util.List<Farm> allFarms)
        create product selection calculator for this farm based on consumat model, decide which of the five decisions the farm will pursue Fuzzy logic is used for optimization and imitation decisions to select a set of products to pursue. For the sensitivity testing phase, we need to 'fake' a linear programming model so we select half of the set to return as our final decision. We keep track of both sets for use during the sensitivity analysis
        Parameters:
        allFarms - full list of all farms in system
        Returns:
        List containing the full fuzzy logic selection

      • updateDissimilarity_ISB

        public void updateDissimilarity_ISB(java.util.List<Farm> farms)
        Using list of all current farms in the system and the social network of the main farm, update the main farm's Information Seeking Behavior (ISB) value based on the social network weight and the dissimilarity between neighbor's activity types
        Parameters:
        farms - Input list of all farms in the system.

      • updateExperiencePlusAge

        public void updateExperiencePlusAge()
        Each time period, t, call this function to increment the experience vector of this farm. This experience vector is part of a shared experience matrix that all farms contain. If the farm is currently farming a product, then increase the experience of that product for that farm. For all other possible products in the experience vector for this farm, decrement the experience by one year.
        Increment the age of the farmer each time step.
